HOME.SubHEAD1: A brave new way to watch, play, learn, make,
HOME.SubHEAD2: and discover the world of Bitcoin.
HOME.test3: Explore new skills, deepen existing passions, and get lost in creativity. What you find just might surprise and inspire you.

PRFILE.DIALOG2.HEAD: Password
PRFILE.DIALOG2.TEXT: To change your password, type in and confirm your new password below.
PRFILE.DIALOG1.HEAD: Correspondence
PRFILE.DIALOG1.TEXT: To change your email, please enter a new email address with current password here.

PRFILE.DIALOG3.TEXT: Warning: Deleting this account is irreversible.
PRFILE.DIALOG4.HEAD: Update Username
PRFILE.CERTIFICATE.HEAD: Get Your Certificate
PRFILE.CERTIFICATE.TEXT: In order to get a certificate you must complete a simple KYC verification. This allows us to securely attach your identity to your certificate, increasing the verifiability.
PRFILE.CERTIFICATE.COLLAPSE.P1: You will need either a passport or a driving license
PRFILE.CERTIFICATE.COLLAPSE.P2: Do a Face-Scan to verify your identity
PRFILE.CERTIFICATE.COLLAPSE.P3: Once confirmed, you will receive your physical certificate
PRFILE.TUTOR.TEXT: Earn money by helping other students learn how to code on Bitcoin SV. You must have finished at least one lesson to be applicable.
PRFILE.TUTOR.COLLAPSE.H1: Tell us a bit more about you
PRFILE.TUTOR.COLLAPSE.P1: Please tell us a bit about you so we can personalise your on boarding experience
PRFILE.TUTOR.COLLAPSE.li1: Enter a brief, yet concise description that describes who you are and how you can help potential students.
PRFILE.TUTOR.COLLAPSE.li2: Be yourself! If you are not an expert programmer, that is ok. You can still help some of the people who are just starting out on the platform.
